name: WhiteSource
description: Detect & fix security vulnerabilities, problematic open source licenses and quality issues.
author: WhiteSource

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Work directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Current working directory when WhiteSource is run.

inputs.name: extensions
inputs.label: Extension list
inputs.helpMarkDown: List of extensions separated by space

inputs.name: exclude
inputs.label: Exclude list
inputs.helpMarkDown: List of exclude folders separated by space

inputs.name: checkPolicies
inputs.label: Check policies
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select whether to evaluate the policy conditions. Will allow to fail the build in case of policy failure

inputs.name: productRule
inputs.label: Product identifier
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the identifier for the relevant product. Identifier can be either 'Product name' or 'Product token'.

inputs.name: productName
inputs.label: Product name
inputs.helpMarkDown: A name that uniquely identifies the product to create or update. If you are creating a new product, then enter a unique name for the new product. If you are updating an existing product, then provide its name, which can be found on the WhiteSource GUI (on the GUI, select 'Products' from the main navigation menu, and then select 'View All' to view all your existing products).

inputs.name: productToken
inputs.label: Product token
inputs.helpMarkDown: A token that uniquely identifies the existing product to update. Product tokens can be found on the 'Integrate' page within the WhiteSource GUI. If you do not have access to this page, then please contact your WhiteSource account administrator.

inputs.name: productVersion
inputs.label: Product version
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is used to override any versions inferred by default. Version of the product to update.

inputs.name: requesterEmail
inputs.label: Requester email
inputs.helpMarkDown: Email of the WhiteSource user that requests to update WhiteSource.

inputs.name: projectRule
inputs.label: Project identifier
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the identifier for the relevant project. Identifier can be either 'Project name' or 'Project token'.

inputs.name: projectName
inputs.label: Project name
inputs.helpMarkDown: A name that uniquely identifies the project to create or update. If you are creating a new project, then enter a unique name for the new project. If you are updating an existing project, then provide its name, which can be found on the WhiteSource GUI (on the GUI, select 'Projects' from the main navigation menu, and then select 'View All' to view all your existing projects).

inputs.name: projectToken
inputs.label: Project token
inputs.helpMarkDown: A token that uniquely identifies the existing project to update. Project tokens can be found on the 'Integrate' page within the WhiteSource GUI. If you do not have access to this page, then please contact your WhiteSource account administrator.

inputs.name: projectVersion
inputs.label: Project version
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is used to override any versions inferred by default. Version of the project to update.

inputs.name: forceCheckAllDependencies
inputs.label: Force check all dependencies
inputs.helpMarkDown: Policies will be checked only for new dependencies introduced to the WhiteSource projects. Used only if Check Policies is enabled.

inputs.name: forceUpdate
inputs.label: Force update
inputs.helpMarkDown: Force update no matter if there is any policy failure

inputs.name: failOnError
inputs.label: Fail on error
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether to fail the build on a general error (e.g. network error). Setting this to false means that the plugin will fail the build only for policy violations.

inputs.name: WhiteSourceService
inputs.label: WhiteSource endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the WhiteSource end point to use. If needed, click on 'manage', and add a new Service Endpoint of type 'WhiteSource server connection'

inputs.name: proxyUrl
inputs.label: Proxy url
inputs.helpMarkDown: The proxy server from which you want to redirect the messages. (e.g - http://10.0.0.1:8080)

inputs.name: proxyUsername
inputs.label: Proxy username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter proxy username if necessary

inputs.name: proxyPassword
inputs.label: Proxy password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter proxy password if necessary

inputs.name: connectionTimeoutField
inputs.label: Connection timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: Default value - 60 minutes

inputs.name: connectionRetries
inputs.label: Connection Retries
inputs.helpMarkDown: Connection retries when unable to connect to WhiteSource service (default value - 1)

inputs.name: connectionRetriesInterval
inputs.label: Connection Retries Interval
inputs.helpMarkDown: Connection intervals (default value is: 3).
